events.name: Fusion 360
events.description:
Fusion 360
by Badari Hiriyur

Fusion 360â„¢ is the first 3D CAD/CAM tool of its kind, connecting your entire product development process in a single cloud-based tool. Which will also help you to connect to your 3D printer & bring your ideas in to real life.
After this talk, you will understand the basics of 3D modeling technology & cloud based technology workflow.
Participants are encouraged tobring a laptop with Fusion 360 software installed. at
